snippet: An international group, not yet determined, will take over the task of assigning names and numbers for Internet addresses.
abstract: Government officials say United States will give up its role overseeing system of Web addresses and domain names that form backbone of Internet; international group, not yet determined, will take over task of assigning names and numbers for Internet addresses.
lead_paragraph: An international group, not yet determined, will take over the task of assigning names and numbers for Internet addresses.

headline.main: U.S. to Cede Its Oversight of Addresses on Internet
headline.print_headline: U.S. to Cede Its Oversight of Addresses on Internet

keywords.value: Internet Corp for Assigned Names and Numbers
keywords.name: organizations
